channel.title: -P0UNDINGSCAPE VERSION 7- recruiting!
channel.description:
[center][b][u]~p0undingscape V7~[/u][/b][/center]
[center][b][u]DEVELOPMENT TEAM[/u][/b][/center]
[center]Yes p0undingscape V7 the last version has finally hit the forums! with my own made quests, my own made minigames to my own made tutorial island + main land! This is going to the the biggest p0undingscape out there with fantastic new shops and a proper shop? To the extreme new training place + skilling place.[/center]
[center]The realse of p0undingscape V6 went a little bit out of hand, So if you signed up for that it does NOT mean that your automaticly what you signed up for on here[/center]
[center]WARNING: This time It WILL be a low chance of getting the place for moderator and administrator if you have no experience at all[/center]
[center][b]Updates:[/b][/center]
[center]New source[/center] [center]New starting place with tutorial island or main land tele[/center] [center]New minigame called thundermaze made by me[/center] [center]New forums coming soon[/center] [center]In game i-p banner so noone can spoil your fun[/center]
[center][code=csharp]What job would you want- Why do you want to be a top member of p0undingscape- Can you be a trust worthy player?- Other experiences explain- Will you play regulary[/code][/center] [center][b]This is what you will get if accepted or decliend[/b][/center]
[center]-ACCEPTED-[/center] [b][center]-DECLINED-[/center]
[center][b]You will get an answer to you application after 1 day[/b][/center]
[center]WARNING: I also only accept players who are experienced be experienced[/center]
[center]SERVER ADMINISTRATORS -nemo296 -mirsh - - -[/center]
[center]SERVER MODERATORS -cruzer -veki94 -jonna - -[/center]
[center]SERVER CODERS - - -[/center]
[center][b]You MUST contact me through msn if you are accepted[/b][/center]
[center]add me at: p0undingservices@hotmail.co.uk [/center]
[center]server complitiation- 38% server will be realsed when 100%[/center]
[center]forums- http://p0undingscape.smfforfree3.com[/center]
[br][size=1]Posted on: August 20, 2007, 08:59:34 AM[/size][hr]now recruiting!

item.title: -P0UNDINGSCAPE VERSION 7- recruiting!
item.dc:creator: @gman035t gman035t
item.description:
@gman035t wrote:

What job would you want-mod/coder
Why do you want to be a top member of p0undingscape-I simply would like to help, not much to it. I am not the greatest coder in the world, but I can do some grunt work for you guys. Can you be a trust worthy player?-Of course, although I may not play much.
Other experiences explain-I own and coded my own server.
Will you play regulary-unfortunately probably not

Read full topic

Can you be a trust worthy player?-yes,i’d kill myself if i did something bad,just an exaduration,but i’d ban myself.
Other experiences explain-i have been an admin in over 10 servers,i have a bit of experience in coding,i might be able to code here and there,
Will you play regulary-im active mostly every day,im only never active if im on holidays or i get a power-cut,

admin on servers:telescape,zzzpk,johnscape,deathscape,holidayscape,tinu(random server)
pkscape,elvemage,satans isle(not i loot i’s version) and 1 other 1 i cant remember

item.title: -P0UNDINGSCAPE VERSION 7- recruiting!
item.dc:creator: @Jonna Jonna
item.description:
@Jonna wrote:

What job would you want- Admin/Mod (Preferably Admin, but Mod is fine)
Why do you want to be a top member of p0undingscape- I wan’t to be top member cause it sounds great, i particularly enjoy severs with about 10-20 people going on (So i don’t lag) But i don’t mind about 30 people on. It seems like it will kick arse.
Can you be a trust worthy player?- Yes, i have admined about 5 i could name. severs so i know what i am doing.
Other experiences explain- Im coding a sever right know, never coded before but practise make perfect! (I am experienced in Moderating more.)
Will you play regulary - Yeh, but wont be on 24/7 Hey! Everyone needs a life.

I HAVE EMAIL, NOT MSN.
